Homepage > Electromagnet

Electromagnet

James and Shine made an electromagnet recently, which James says looks like a bomb. Shine hopes it isn't.

DISCLAIMER:

James Hutchinson and Shine Sun are not responsible for any losses that arise from the creation of these devices.


Don't place near magnetic storage devices (Computers, etc.).
Don't destroy the world with this device.
Otherwise, have fun!

WARNING! HARMFUL IF SWALLOWED!
